body_html:
@cpuhrsch could you specify the CPU type you run the benchmark on? Does it have 16 physical cores in total?
also i have another suggestion to add CNN benchmark in pytorch/benchmark. inside intel we use convnet-benchmark to track the CNN performance.

also , as @MlWoo is leaving Intel today, i will keep following this issue.

@anton-malakhov thank you for your advice, does KMP_COMPOSABILITY=mode=exclusive work in the same way as KMP_BLOCKTIME=0?
